name: adjust_volume
description: Adjusts the volume by a certain percentage.

by.description:
The amount to adjust the volume by, in percentage points. Can be positive or negative.
Values are clamped between 0 and 100 after adjustment.

setting.description:
The specific volume setting to adjust. If None or "UNSPECIFIED", adjusts all volume settings.
Valid options: "ALARM", "CALL", "MEDIA", "NOTIFICATION", "RING", "UNSPECIFIED"

name: get
description: Gets the current value of a device setting.

setting_type.description:
Setting to get the value of. Must be one of the getable device settings.
Valid values include: "AIRPLANE_MODE", "ALARM_VOLUME", "AUTO_ROTATE", "BATTERY", 
"BATTERY_SAVER", "BLUETOOTH", "CALL_VOLUME", "DO_NOT_DISTURB", "FLASHLIGHT", 
"HOT_SPOT", "MEDIA_VOLUME", "NETWORK", "NFC", "NIGHT_MODE", "NOTIFICATION_VOLUME", 
"RING_VOLUME", "TALK_BACK", "VOLUME", "VIBRATION", "WIFI"

name: get_app_notification_status
description: Gets the current notification setting for a specific app.

app_name.description: Name of the app to get notification settings for

name: get_device_insights
description: Generates device insights based on user's current device state.

device_state_type.description:
The type of device state to get insights for. If None or "UNCATEGORIZED",
returns general device insights. Valid options: "UNCATEGORIZED", "BATTERY", "STORAGE"

name: get_installed_apps
description: Retrieves a list of all applications installed on the device, excluding their notification settings.

setting.description:
The specific volume setting to mute. If None or "UNSPECIFIED", mutes all volume settings.
Valid options: "ALARM", "CALL", "MEDIA", "NOTIFICATION", "RING", "UNSPECIFIED"

Setting to turn off. Must be one of the toggleable device settings.
Valid values include: "AIRPLANE_MODE", "AUTO_ROTATE", "BATTERY_SAVER", 
"BLUETOOTH", "DO_NOT_DISTURB", "FLASHLIGHT", "HOT_SPOT", "NETWORK", 
"NFC", "NIGHT_MODE", "TALK_BACK", "VIBRATION", "WIFI"

Setting to turn on. Must be one of the toggleable device settings.
Valid values include: "AIRPLANE_MODE", "AUTO_ROTATE", "BATTERY_SAVER", 
"BLUETOOTH", "DO_NOT_DISTURB", "FLASHLIGHT", "HOT_SPOT", "NETWORK", 
"NFC", "NIGHT_MODE", "TALK_BACK", "VIBRATION", "WIFI"

name: open
description: Navigates to the settings page for a given setting type.

setting_type.description:
Setting to open. Can be a DeviceSettingType enum value as string.
Use "UNSPECIFIED" if the user only mentions "settings."
If None or UNSPECIFIED, open general device settings page.
Valid values include: "UNSPECIFIED", "ACCESSIBILITY", "ACCOUNT", "AIRPLANE_MODE", 
"ALARM_VOLUME", "APPLICATION", "APP_DATA_USAGE", "AUTO_ROTATE", "BARD", "BATTERY", 
"BATTERY_SAVER", "BIOMETRIC", "BLUETOOTH", "BLUETOOTH_PAIRING", "BRIGHTNESS", 
"CALL_VOLUME", "CAST", "DARK_THEME", "DATA_SAVER", "DATE_TIME", "DEVELOPER_OPTION", 
"DEVICE_INFO", "DISPLAY", "DO_NOT_DISTURB", "GEMINI", "GOOGLE_ASSISTANT", "HOT_SPOT", 
"INTERNAL_STORAGE", "LANGUAGE", "LOCATION", "LOCK_SCREEN", "MEDIA_VOLUME", "NETWORK", 
"NFC", "NIGHT_MODE", "NOTIFICATION_VOLUME", "RING_VOLUME", "TALK_BACK", "VOLUME", 
"VIBRATION", "WIFI"

name: set_app_notification_status
description: Sets the current notification setting for a specific app.

app_name.description: Name of the app to modify

notifications.description: "on" or "off" to set the notification state

name: set_volume
description: Sets the volume to a specific percentage.

to.description: The volume level to set to, in percentage points. Must be between 0 and 100.

setting.description:
The specific volume setting to set. If None or "UNSPECIFIED", sets all volume settings.
Valid options: "ALARM", "CALL", "MEDIA", "NOTIFICATION", "RING", "UNSPECIFIED"

name: unmute
description: Unmutes the device volume by setting to default levels.

setting.description:
The specific volume setting to unmute. If None or "UNSPECIFIED", unmutes all volume settings.
Valid options: "ALARM", "CALL", "MEDIA", "NOTIFICATION", "RING", "UNSPECIFIED"
Default levels: ALARM_VOLUME=50, CALL_VOLUME=70, MEDIA_VOLUME=60, 
               NOTIFICATION_VOLUME=40, RING_VOLUME=80, VOLUME=65
